Package skrull.game.view

Interface Summary
IClientAction A single action from a single player.
IGameClientView The primary view interface
 

Class Summary
ChatPanel ChatPanel builds the chat panel for the user to interact with and is part of every view that the user will see except once a game has finished with a winner.
ClientAction  
ClientInputHandler  
DefaultPanel  
GameClientView GameClientView extends JFrame and implements IGameClientView.
LoserPanel  
Player  
ReturnToMainButton  
RockPaperScissorsPanel RockPaperScissorsPanel builds the game panel for rock, paper, scissors and lays out the components that will be used if the user selects to either start or join a RockPaperScissors game.
TicTacToePanel TicTacToePanel build the TicTacToe game view that will display when the user selects to either create or join a TicTacToe game.
UserPanel UserPanel is an abstract class that provides functionality to other panels that will be used in the user view.
WinnerPanel WinnerPanel is a panel that will be displayed when a user wins.
 

Enum Summary
IClientAction.ActionType Each IClientAction must declare one of these.
